classification.task_goal: Design and implement a database for a group project based on a provided scenario.
primary_constraints: All required tables must be implemented using Oracle APEX.
Each group member must submit a copy of the group's report.
Any report submitted late will be capped at 40%.
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially failed to provide specific visual elements (ER diagram) and entity specification forms, which are constraints of the task. The user later acknowledged this and was prompted to create these elements separately, thus repairing the task constraints.
